message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to be discussing the sale of this product with you. I believe it holds significant value for your operations. I'd like to start the conversation by offering it to you for $1,450,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000.

Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but the value of this product to your operations is undeniable. It can significantly improve your efficiency and bottom line. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product can bring to our operations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,375,000.
Bob, we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Let's make this deal happen at $1,387,500.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,370,000.
